text: Hmm what does the linting warnings look like? I don't think I've seen any complaints about my bad code yet. Does it show it anywhere specifically

elements.text: Hmm what does the linting warnings look like? I don't think I've seen any complaints about my bad code yet. Does it show it anywhere specifically

text: It should highlight the file in the folder window (an orange color or something), it should highlight the lines with warning, and the number of warnings (and errors) should appear in the bottom line of the vscode, to the left (a circled cross for errors and a triangle for warnings).

elements.text: It should highlight the file in the folder window (an orange color or something), it should highlight the lines with warning, and the number of warnings (and errors) should appear in the bottom line of the vscode, to the left (a circled cross for errors and a triangle for warnings).

text: Oh that's weird. None of these things show up for me. I'm using Linux and Code - OSS which I think very very similar to VS Code. Let me look into this more and I'll see if I can find it. Thanks for the screenshots and diagrams!!
